title: Male stars at Berlin film festival say #MeToo movement is making them think
text:
Male stars at Berlin film festival say #MeToo movement is making them think Friday, February 16, 2018 - 01:03 
Male stars at the Berlin film festival say they are reassessing their own behavior in light of the #MeToo movement by women against sexual harassment and abuse. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Male stars at the Berlin film festival say they are reassessing their own behavior in light of the #MeToo movement by women against sexual harassment and abuse.
